item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND." OFTEN COPIED, NEVER DUPLICATED.

SATURDAY, MAY 1, Crown Plaza, Grand Ballroom, 801 Greenwich Ave., Warwick, RI. Exit 12A off Rte. 95. (401)732-6000.
www.se-4u.com.
Dance music by award-winning DJ, 8:30 – 12 AM.
Complimentary hors d’oeuvres, 9-10.
Free dance lessons 7:30-8:30.
Free door prizes, raffles, & additional MATCH game prizes.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES & COUPLES 35-60 yrs. old.
Proper business dress required…sports jacket, or tie, for men required; business or party finery for women.
Admittance is $12.
Co-Sponsored by RI Most Eligible Singles
Info call (781)446-0234.

OPEN TO THE PUBLIC; MEMBERSHIP NOT REQUIRED.
item.how_to_find_us: ASK FOR PAM AT THE DOOR.
item.name: "THE SINGLE EXECUTIVES CLUB" SINGLES DANCE.
